title: I just played a 7 minute aram game
body:
It was 2 v 5 and I was on the 5 man team, LMAO best match I've had all day ;,) 
Earned no IP though AHAHAHAHAH

replies.body: downvoted for the fact you earnt no ip when its clearly a system side failure

> [{quoted}](name=Mage Apollyon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MAhZ2mLv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-02T03:17:05.575+0000)
>
> downvoted for the fact you earnt no ip when its clearly a system side failure

How is it clearly a system failure? There's no evidence at all for that conclusion.
yeah you don't earn IP if games are too short.

LMAO didnt report the other 3 LMAO id be so incredibly salty if i was one of the other 2 LMAO when other teams are unlucky with who they're matched with i consider myself a better player having won that game LMAO
